column5: Just watched the local news which reported a Bass boat caught fire out from Bewdely, and pics showed that it was totalled, luckely 3 people on board made it to shore safely, problem was apparently with the injectors
...Or maybe he was overinsured for fire damage...
Got this picture from another forum, someone else took it.
Not a fun day for sure! I'm thinking a trimmed up motor could have put a lot of water on that fire.... or someone with a power washer.
A bass boat burns and is a total lost and they know WHY already...  Hard to believe but I "guess" it could be....
